Hello, I'm Ahmed
Welcome to the ongoing course for learning how to use the Linux operating system

· What is the Linux operating system?
· What are Linux distributions?
· What are the main families of Linux distributions?
· How do I download a Linux distribution?
· What is the difference between Linux and other operating systems?

We will focus on how to use the system in general, and especially on Ubuntu and Kali Linux, which are among the most popular distributions. We will study the terminal and its basic and advanced commands in detail. Then, we will move on to the fundamentals of the system and how to develop our skills in using Linux
